text: @GavinNewsom Yes Governor Newsom, we all have to be conscious regarding the Coronavirus.  We have lost so many lives, and soooo many are still fighting this virus.  Thank you for caring about the lives of people.  Don’t pay attention of the careless and unconscious people. God Bless You.
